blocks.translated_text: Huh?

blocks.orig_text:

blocks.translated_text:

blocks.orig_text: あっ、せんぱい

blocks.orig_text:
いつも元気なエミちゃ
んがめずらしいなあ
いったい何をそんなに
悩んでるの？
blocks.translated_text:
It's unusual for the
always cheerful Emi-chan...
What's bothering you so
much?

blocks.orig_text:
あ、いえっ！
ななっ、なんでもない
ですぅっ！！
blocks.translated_text:
Ah, no!
N-N-Nothing's wrong!!

blocks.orig_text:
・・・なんで
赤くなるんだろ？
blocks.translated_text:
...Why
is she blushing?

blocks.orig_text:
どうしたッスか、先輩
・・・って、あれ？
エミじゃないか
なにやってんだよ
blocks.translated_text:
What's up, Senpai?
...Wait, huh?
Isn't that Emi?
What are you doing?

blocks.orig_text:
なんでもないって！
・・・いいから先輩も
カツヤも、私のことは

blocks.translated_text:
It's nothing!
...Just leave me alone,

about me.

blocks.orig_text:
どうしよう？
　そっとしておく
　心配だな
blocks.translated_text:
What should I do?
  Leave her alone
  I'm worried

blocks.orig_text:

・・・ま、いいや
センパイ、こんな凶暴
女ほっときましょう
blocks.translated_text:
Why is she angry?
...Well, whatever.
Senpai, let's just leave
this violent woman alone.

blocks.orig_text:
あっ
ちょっとカツヤ君！
blocks.translated_text:
Ah,
Hey, Katsuya-kun!

blocks.orig_text:
先輩、本当にたいした
ことじゃないですから
あんまり気にしないで
くださいね
blocks.translated_text:
Senpai, it's really
nothing, so please
don't worry too
much about it.

blocks.orig_text:
・・・
ならいいんだけど
blocks.translated_text:
...
If you say so...

blocks.orig_text:

早く帰りましょうよぉ
blocks.translated_text:
Senpaaaai!
Let's go home quickly!

blocks.orig_text: ほら、呼んでますよ
blocks.translated_text: See, she's calling you.

blocks.orig_text:
うん
じゃあ、また明日ね
blocks.translated_text:
Yeah.
See you tomorrow then.

blocks.orig_text: さよなら、せんぱい
blocks.translated_text: Goodbye, Senpai.

blocks.orig_text:
うーん・・・

blocks.translated_text:

I'm still worried.

blocks.orig_text:

nature is acting up
again.

blocks.orig_text:
あ、あの・・・
せんぱい？
blocks.translated_text:
Uh, um...
Senpai?

blocks.orig_text:

やっぱあたし今日は
一緒に帰るの
やめとくわ
blocks.translated_text:
Sorry, Katsuya-kun.
I think I'll pass on
going home together
today.

blocks.orig_text:
へいへい
予想してましたよ
blocks.translated_text:
Heh heh,
I was expecting that.

blocks.orig_text:
俺はいいですからガラ
にもなくたそがれてる
コイツをよろしく面倒
見てやって下さいな
blocks.translated_text:
Don't worry about me.
Please take care of
this guy who's acting
out of character.

blocks.orig_text:
ちょっ・・・
それってどういう
意味よっ！？
blocks.translated_text:
H-Hey...
What do you mean by
that!?

blocks.orig_text:
ひゃあ！
そんじゃセンパイっ
さいならぁ〜っ！
blocks.translated_text:

Well then, Senpai,
see you later!

blocks.orig_text:

blocks.orig_text:

blocks.orig_text:

blocks.translated_text:

blocks.orig_text:

That's mean!
I have the right to
choose who I like,
you know!

blocks.orig_text:
そういうセンパイこそ

blocks.translated_text:
Speaking of which,
doesn't Senpai have
someone special?

blocks.orig_text: いや、フリーだよ
blocks.translated_text: Nope, I'm free.

blocks.orig_text: ホントですかぁ？
blocks.translated_text: Really?

blocks.orig_text:

仕方がないだろう
誰ともつきあって
なんかないさ
blocks.translated_text:
There's no point
in lying.
I'm not seeing
anyone.

blocks.orig_text:
へえ・・・
なんか意外だなぁ
blocks.translated_text:

That's surprising.

blocks.orig_text:

どんなタイプが好み
なんですか？
blocks.translated_text:

what kind of person
do you like?

blocks.orig_text:
なんだよ、いきなり
別の話題にしないか？

Hey, why are you
suddenly changing
the subject?

blocks.orig_text: えへへ、ダーメ
blocks.translated_text: Ehehe, no way.

blocks.orig_text:
・・・なんか、ハメ

blocks.translated_text:

been tricked.

blocks.orig_text:

blocks.translated_text:

blocks.orig_text:
ふむふむ、活発な人が
タイプですか
なるほどー
blocks.translated_text:
Hmm hmm, so you like
energetic girls.
I see.

blocks.orig_text:

I see...

人がタイプですか
なるほどー
blocks.translated_text:
Hmm hmm, so you like
calm girls.
I see.

blocks.orig_text:

つきをもつほうが先だ

blocks.translated_text:
I think Senpai needs
to calm down a little
first.
That's what I think.

blocks.orig_text:

そういうお前は
どんなタイプが
いいんだ？

So,
what kind of guy do
you like then?

blocks.orig_text:

blocks.orig_text: そうですね・・・

blocks.orig_text: はいっ！

but could this be...

blocks.orig_text: 剣、じゃないのか？
blocks.translated_text: A sword, isn't it?

blocks.orig_text:
なんで、こんなとこに
剣が刺さってんだ！？
blocks.translated_text:
Why is there a sword
stuck here!?

blocks.orig_text:
この上に・・・
いったい何があるって
いうんだ！？
blocks.translated_text:
What could possibly
be up there!?

blocks.orig_text:
ん？
あそこにも何か
刺さっているようだが
blocks.translated_text:
Hm?
It looks like there's
something else stuck
over there.

blocks.orig_text:
これは・・・
剣じゃないか！？
blocks.translated_text:
This is...
A sword, isn't it!?

blocks.orig_text:
どうして、こんな物が
こんな場所に・・・
blocks.translated_text:
Why is something like
this in a place like
this...?

blocks.orig_text:
いや、それ以前にどう
すればこんな金属の塊
がひしゃげるんだ？
blocks.translated_text:
No, before that, how
could a hunk of metal
like this get crushed?

blocks.orig_text:
普通じゃないことだけ
はたしかだ・・・
blocks.translated_text:
One thing's for sure,
this is not normal...

blocks.orig_text:
・・・なんなんだよ
まるで爆弾が爆発した
みたいじゃないか
blocks.translated_text:
...What the hell?
It looks like a bomb
went off.

blocks.orig_text:
この人たち、
大丈夫なのか？
blocks.translated_text:
Are these people
going to be okay?

blocks.orig_text:
もしもし！
返事できますか？
blocks.translated_text:
Hello!
Can you hear me?

blocks.orig_text: 死んじまってる・・・
blocks.translated_text: They're dead...

blocks.orig_text:
みんな、死んじまって
るよ・・・
blocks.translated_text:
They're all
dead...

blocks.orig_text: なんなんだよッ！？
blocks.translated_text: What the hell!?

blocks.orig_text: うっ・・・
blocks.translated_text: Ugh...

blocks.orig_text: うわあぁぁ〜〜っ！！
blocks.translated_text: Uwaaaaahhh!!

blocks.orig_text:
この人たち、みんな死
んでしまってる・・・
blocks.translated_text:
These people... they're
all dead...

blocks.orig_text:
いったい、
何が起きたって
いうんだ？
blocks.translated_text:
What in the world
happened?

blocks.orig_text: 僕のせい、なのか？
blocks.translated_text: Is it... my fault?

blocks.orig_text:
とにかく、急いでここ
から立ち去ろう！
blocks.translated_text:
Anyway, I need to
get out of here, fast!

blocks.orig_text: うーん・・・
blocks.translated_text: Hmm...

blocks.orig_text: 今のはいったい・・・
blocks.translated_text: What was that...

blocks.orig_text:
えっ！？
ここはどこなの！？
blocks.translated_text:
Eh!?
Where is this!?

blocks.orig_text:
なにかの穴の底みたい
だけど・・・なんで、
こんなとこに・・・？
blocks.translated_text:
It looks like the bottom
of some kind of hole...
But why am I... here?

blocks.orig_text:
どうしよう？
　とにかくここから出よう
　これはそう、夢なのよ！
blocks.translated_text:
What should I do?
  Get out of here
  That's right, this is a dream!

blocks.orig_text:
うーん、きっとこれは
夢なんだわ
だからほら、こうして
ほほをつねれば・・
blocks.translated_text:
Hmm, this must be
a dream.
So, if I pinch my cheek
like this...

blocks.orig_text:
いたいっ！
・・・夢じゃない！？
blocks.translated_text:
Ouch!
...This isn't a dream!?

blocks.orig_text:
ここにいても
しかたがないわ
まずは穴の上まで
登ってみよう
blocks.translated_text:
There's no point in
staying here. First, I'll try
climbing up to the top
of this hole.

blocks.orig_text:
ん？
なんだろう、これ
blocks.translated_text:
Hm?
What is this?

blocks.orig_text:
すごくキレイな石
なんか、いろんな色の
があちこちに飛びちっ
ているみたいね
blocks.translated_text:
What a beautiful stone.
There are all sorts of
colors scattered around,
it seems.

blocks.orig_text:
どうしよう？
　全部拾っておこうかな
　そんな場合じゃないわ
blocks.translated_text:
What should I do?
  Should I pick them all up?
  This is no time for that.

blocks.orig_text:
宝石かもしれないし、
とりあえず何種類ずつ
かは拾っていこう
blocks.translated_text:
It could be a gem, so
I'll pick up at least
one of each kind.

blocks.orig_text:
何かの役にたつかも
しれないしね
blocks.translated_text:
They might come in
handy someday.

blocks.orig_text:
ううん、そんな
場合じゃないわ・・・
まずはここを出ないと
blocks.translated_text:
No, this is no time
for that...
First, I need to get
out of here.

blocks.orig_text:
とりあえず、目につい
たものだけ拾っておく
ことにしよう
blocks.translated_text:
For now, I'll just
pick up the ones that
catch my eye.

blocks.orig_text:
・・・なによ
なんでみんな
倒れてるのよ！？
blocks.translated_text:
...What?
Why is everyone
collapsed!?

blocks.orig_text:
ねえ、
誰か返事をしてよ？
blocks.translated_text:
Hey,
answer me!

blocks.orig_text: ねえってば！
blocks.translated_text: Hey, I said!

blocks.orig_text: ・・・ウソでしょ？
blocks.translated_text: ...You're kidding, right?

blocks.orig_text:
こんなのって、
無責任じゃない・・・
blocks.translated_text:
This is...
irresponsible...

blocks.orig_text: 誰か説明してよ！？
blocks.translated_text:
Someone explain this
to me!?

blocks.orig_text: ・・・やだよぅ
blocks.translated_text: ...I don't want this.

blocks.orig_text: こんなのやだようっ！
blocks.translated_text: I don't want this!

blocks.orig_text: あのっ・・・
blocks.translated_text: Um...

......
Are they... dead?

blocks.orig_text: ひどい・・・
blocks.translated_text: This is awful...

blocks.orig_text:
どうして、こんなこと
になってしまったの
blocks.translated_text:
How did it come to
this?

blocks.orig_text: 私のせいなの？
blocks.translated_text: Is this my fault?

blocks.orig_text: ・・・イヤっ！
イヤあぁぁっ！！
blocks.translated_text: Noooo!!
